# swapi_planet (Resource)

Planet resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "swapi_planet" "mustafar" {
  name       = "Mustafar"
  diameter   = 4200
  population = 1 #vader
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Planet Name

### Optional

- `diameter` (Number) Planet diameter
- `population` (Number) Planet population

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Planet id
